HOMEWOOD, BALTIMORE, MD., MARCH 20, 1928

BLACK AND BLUE JAY
TO DINE APRIL 14
Members of the Black and
Blue Jay editorial and business staffs will gather at the
Southern Hotel on the night
of April fourteenth for their
annual banquet.
According to Leonard Dalsemer, business manager of
the Jay, this date is permanent
but the location is not as yet
definite. Election of men to
the Board of Control for the
ensuing year will be held at
this time.

three of them cheat for everyone
that refuses to do so. Over 300
confess that they give or receive
assistance occasionally, while 110 replied to a negative; 4 men cheat

greater, and 50 less respect of the
